title: Fix mobile search form and remove extra spacing wrappers across Home/Tags/Tag/Pond pages

requirements.text: In the mobile search UI, set the search form to use `margin-block-end: auto` so the form aligns correctly on mobile.

quotes: you still havent made the margin-block-end: auto in mobile version for the search form.

acceptanceCriteria: On mobile, the search form in the mobile search modal has `margin-block-end: auto` applied (via inline style or equivalent CSS).
No layout regressions in the mobile search header (input remains vertically centered and full-width).

requirements.text: On the Home page, remove padding from the wrapper div currently using `className="py-4 px-4 lg:px-0 lg:py-0"` so it no longer applies padding.

quotes: remove the padding from this div in the homepage: <div class="py-4 px-4 lg:px-0 lg:py-0">

acceptanceCriteria: Home page no longer applies `py-4` and `px-4` padding from that wrapper around the tabs header area.
Desktop layout remains aligned within the `lg:container` grid.

requirements.text: On the Tags page (Tag Hub), remove the `mb-4` margin-bottom from the tabs header divider container (the div described as `class="border-b border-border bg-background mb-4"`) so there is no bottom margin applied by that element.

quotes: remove the margin-bottom from this div in the tags page (tag hub): <div class="border-b border-border bg-background mb-4">

acceptanceCriteria: The Tags (Tag Hub) header divider container does not include `mb-4`.
No unwanted vertical gap appears below the tabs header on the Tags page.

requirements.text: On the Tag page, remove the `mb-4` margin-bottom from the Tabs root container described as `class="flex flex-col gap-2 mb-4"` (e.g., by overriding the Tabs root class/style in `TagPage.tsx` without editing shadcn/ui source files).

quotes: remove this margin-bottom from this div in the tag page: <div dir="ltr" data-orientation="horizontal" data-slot="tabs" class="flex flex-col gap-2 mb-4">

acceptanceCriteria: The Tag page Tabs root container has no `margin-bottom: 1rem` effect (no `mb-4` visible in computed styles).
No changes are made inside `frontend/src/components/ui/*` (compose/override from the page level instead).

requirements.text: On the Pond page, remove the always-rendered mobile-only padding wrapper `div` with `className="py-4 px-4 lg:hidden"` that creates empty vertical space; if that wrapper is currently used for the Join button area, refactor so the wrapper only renders when the Join button section is actually shown (i.e., when the user is not a member).

quotes: remove this div in the pond page:

acceptanceCriteria: When the user is already a pond member, there is no empty padded spacer area at the top of the pond feed on mobile.
The Join Pond CTA still appears on mobile for non-members, with appropriate spacing, but without an always-present empty wrapper.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui/*` (immutable shadcn/ui sources); apply spacing overrides from page/components that consume them instead.
nonGoals: No new features or redesign beyond the specified spacing/layout adjustments.
